metadata.name: Chapter Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you enable/disable chapters/modes/bosses/rooms/etc.
I wanted an easy way to see which chapters were unlocked, and decided to extend this to achievements that aren't related to specific item/trinket/card/rune unlocks.
Everything here is already in "Stat and Achievement Shenanigans", just grouped together nicer.
There's also options to navigate between stages.
